subscriptions.name: Printer Service - Gold
subscriptions.description: The Gold subscription offers regular maintenance and minor repairs, including cartridge replacement, cleaning, and diagnostic checks. Ideal for personal users with moderate printing needs.

subscriptions.name: Printer Service - Silver
subscriptions.description: The Silver subscription provides basic printer service including bi-annual maintenance and troubleshooting support. Ideal for light home office use.

subscriptions.name: Printer Service - Diamond
subscriptions.description: The Diamond subscription gives premium service including priority repair, unlimited ink, annual full inspection, and 24/7 customer support. Best suited for high-volume printing businesses.

subscriptions.name: Printer Service - Platinum
subscriptions.description: The Platinum subscription is designed for enterprise-level users. It offers everything in the Diamond plan, plus an extra set of free accessories every year and an exclusive VIP support hotline.

subscriptions.name: Printer Service - Basic
subscriptions.description: The Basic subscription offers minimal support including diagnostic troubleshooting once per year and limited discounts on repair parts. Perfect for occasional home users.

warranties.name: Standard Warranty
warranties.coverage: Covers defects in materials and workmanship. Limited to hardware issues. Does not cover accidental damage or misuse.

warranties.name: Extended Warranty
warranties.coverage: Includes all coverage of the Standard Warranty plus free repair services for accidental damage (excluding intentional misuse).

warranties.name: Premium Warranty
warranties.coverage: Comprehensive warranty including full coverage for both hardware and accidental damage. Priority service and 24/7 support.

warranties.name: Lifetime Warranty
warranties.coverage: Covers all repairs and maintenance for the lifetime of the printer, including both hardware defects and accidental damage. VIP treatment with a dedicated support line.

warranties.name: Accidental Damage Warranty
warranties.coverage: Covers all accidental damages like drops, spills, and mishandling. Includes free replacement for broken components. Does not cover wear and tear from normal use.
